events.message: The customer filed a claim regarding a recent car collision that occurred at an intersection causing significant damage to their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords related to vehicle and collision found in the filing.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to handle communication and coordinate with the customer for further processing.
The customer received confirmation that their claim has been successfully acknowledged and is now under review.
The company requested supporting documents including photos of the vehicle damage and the police accident report to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all required documents promptly, including images of the damaged car and a copy of the official collision report.
The investigation team has begun assessing the claim details, reviewing submitted evidence to verify the circumstances of the accident.
The investigation concluded confirming the accident details matched the provided documentation and vehicle damage was consistent.
A settlement offer was prepared and proposed to the customer covering vehicle repair costs and associated expenses.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal expressing satisfaction with the offer and faster-than-expected processing.
The claim was formally approved after agreement on settlement terms, authorizing the release of payment for damages.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account covering all vehicle repairs and related expenses.
The claim case was officially closed indicating all processes completed and the customer satisfied with the resolution.
